casebody.head_matter:
591 A.2d 1053
STATE FARM FIRE & CASUALTY COMPANY v. Steven R. SPRAGLIN, Scott W. Sinning, Dickinson College and Alpha Chi Rho, Intervenors. Appeal of Scott W. SINNING.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 10, 1991.
Decided May 29, 1991.
